articles.title: AFL players split on 20-week hub plan — but other athletes are ‘laughing’ at it being a problem - Fox Sports
articles.description: AFLPA vice-president Phil Davis admits he would find it difficult to ask teammates with families to enter quarantine hubs for two months at a time.
articles.content: The players were told via teleconference on Tuesday evening of a proposal in which they would head into one hub for eight weeks - three weeks of pre-season and then five compressed weeks of games - before going home for a week or so, and then entering another… [+4381 chars]

articles.title: Top 10: Lost Formula 1 circuits - PlanetF1
articles.description: We have seen many circuits come and go in the world of Formula 1, some have stood the test of time, others have vanished from the calendar.
articles.content:
We have seen many circuits come and go in the world of Formula 1, some have stood the test of time, others have vanished from the calendar.
Sadly Formula 1 doesn’t stand still as the time passes, and we have lost some truly classic venues.

articles.description: Australian Olympic cycling champion, Anna Meares, says fracturing her neck in 2008 and a quick succession of significant life changes, transformed her outlook on life.

Australian cycling champion Anna Meares has traded her bicycle for a pen to share her story of overcoming significant adversity and change.
